setting.value:
It is our honour to wish you and your loved ones a [COLOR red]Merry Christmas[/COLOR], may your lives be filled with peace and joy all weekend long!
You're encouraged to take some of your free time this weekend to install Kodi for those closest to you, let them enjoy it as much as you do!
Get the most out of Kodi by visiting our Blog for updates regularly: [B][COLOR white]www.tvaddons.ag/kodi-reviews/[/COLOR][/B]
Thank you to all those who have encouraged us from day one, who have helped make our community what it is today.
